CAMPAIGN_CODEX.updateHTML:
IMPORTANT ACTION REQUIRED: Campaign Codex

If you have just updated Campaign Codex from an 1.5.7 or older Execute the 'Migrate Parent Region' macro in the included Compendium
CAMPAIGN_CODEX.welcomePageHTML:
Welcome to Campaign Codex

Folder management, system item price location and system item currency location, and other configurations can be changed in settings.

Be part of the Campaign Codex Community

If you would like to suggest a feature, report a bug, or just want to chat, feel free to join us on Discord.

Found a bug?

If you would like to report a bug and Discord is not your thing head on over to GitHub.

Supporting the development

If you want to support the development, consider taking a look at the membership options on Patreon.

If you prefer, you can support via Ko-fi.

Documentation

Feeling a little lost? Head over to our documentation page for some direction, or jump on Discord and ask a question.

toc.filter: Left-click to Include, Right-click to Exclude.

info.newlink: Created and linked {type} from the scene.

group.notfound: The item you are trying to add could not be found.
group.self: A group cannot be added to itself.

allowPlayerPurchasing.name: Allow players to puchase from Inventories
allowPlayerPurchasing.hint: If enabled players can send items to themselves from an inventory

mapMarkerColor.name: Use CC Accent colour for the map markers
mapMarkerColor.hint: If enabled CC map markers will use the CC Accent colour for the background

mapMarkers.name: Enable Campaign Codex Map Markers
mapMarkers.hint: If enabled CC sheets with a name that starts with an optional letter followed by up to three digits followd by an optional letter will create a custom map marker, ie A13

hideCCbutton.name: Hide CC Scene Button
hideCCbutton.hint: Hide the CC scene button from NON GM users.

useStyledTocButton.name: Styled TOC Button
useStyledTocButton.hint: Enable to use the Campaign Codex theme for the Table of Contents button in the scene controls.

colorPicker.name: Accent Color Override
colorPicker.hint: Override the default theme accent color. Enter a hex code like #d4af37. Leave blank to restore the default.

showOnlyPinned.name: Show Only Pinned Quests in ToC
showOnlyPinned.hint: If checked, the Table of Contents will only show quests that have been marked as 'pinned'.

showStats.name: Show stats in menu
showStats.hint: Will show (#) next to a menu item in the sheets to indicate the number of each kind, viewable by GM only.

roundFinalPrice.name: Round final price to a whole number
roundFinalPrice.hint: Will round the final price of an item to the nearest whole number.

maxRegionDepth.name: Override nesting depth
maxRegionDepth.hint: The number of layers of regions you can create. Default 5, a higher value will be more system intensive.

itemPricePath.name: Override Item Price Path
itemPricePath.hint: Path to item price value (e.g., 'system.price.value' for D&D5e). Leave blank to use detected system.

enableThemes.name: Enable custom theme
enableThemes.hint: Enables the custom colour and typeface selected in Configure Colours.

itemDenominationPath.name: Override Item Currency Path
itemDenominationPath.hint: Path to item currency denomination (e.g., 'system.price.denomination' for D&D5e). Leave blank to use detected system.

itemDenominationOverride.name: Override Denomination
itemDenominationOverride.hint: Currency Denomination (e.g., credits, gp, units). Leave blank to use Item Currency Path or detected system. Campaign Codex will automatically detect the value and denomination for items based on the active game system (e.g., Dungeons and Dragons 5e, Pathfinder 2e, Starfinder, Savage Worlds Adventure Edition, Pathfinder 1e, Old-School Essentials and Daggerheart).

hideBaseCost.name: Hide the Base cost column
hideBaseCost.hint: If you don't want the base cost visible, or the system doesn't have a price path you can set this to hide the column in the inventory tab. Close and reopen sheets to update.

sortCardsAlpha.name: Automatically sort cards alphabetically
sortCardsAlpha.hint: If On, cards will be displayed A-Z

runonlyonce.name: Welcome Message - Disabled
runonlyonce.hint: If On, you won't see the Welcome message

useOrganizedFolders.name: Organise in Folders
useOrganizedFolders.hint: Automatically create and organise Campaign Codex journals in folders

hideByPermission.name: Hide by ownership
hideByPermission.hint: Hide linked sheets if the user does not have observer or higher ownership of the journal

hideInventoryByPermission.name: Hide Inventory Items by ownership
hideInventoryByPermission.hint: Hide Items in Inventories if the user does not have observer or higher ownership of the item

resetItemPathsButton.name: Reset to Defaults
resetItemPathsButton.hint: Enable this option and save to reset settings to default

notifications.itemPricePathsReset: Item price paths reset to D&D5e defaults

dropzone.location: Drag {type} or scenes here to add them
dropzone.shop: Drag {type} journals here to add them
dropzone.npc: Drag {type} or Actors here to add them
dropzone.associate: Drag {type} or Actors here to create relationships
dropzone.item: Drag {type} here to add to inventory

dragToAdd.item: Drag items here to add to inventory

warn.invaliddrop: No members with linked actors found to drop!
warn.nonpcfound: No NPCs available to drop to map!
warn.failedtodrop: Failed to drop NPC to map!
warn.scenenotfound: Could not find the dropped scene.

help.markup: Items without custom prices will use base price Ã— markup

journal.standard: Journal: Drag Standard Journal to link
